title: Company Node Standard
description: Extends the CALM core node definition with company-specific operational properties.

costCenter.description: Company cost center code. Must use the format 'CC-XXXX' where X are digits, e.g., CC-1234.

owner.description: Team or individual responsible for the node (business or technical owner).

environment.description: Deployment environment for this node. Must be one of: development, staging, production.
